snippet.title: Ralf's Adventure: Aztec Mystery - Steam Announcement
snippet.description:
Join Ralf Kennedy in his first adventure, and Take up the Bat!


Ralf's Adventure: Aztec Mystery is coming to Steam on January 6, 2021!
Wishlist now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1438430/Ralfs_Adventure_Aztec_Mystery/

Download the free demo on ItchIO:
https://georgesears.itch.io/ralfs-adventure-aztec-mystery-demo


In this game, you take the role of Ralf Kennedy, a High School student on his Summer Vacation.   Ralf's Mother is an archaeologist, and brings him along on an expedition. You find an ancient temple, but she falls deep within its chambers...

As the star player of your local baseball team, take up the bat, and smack any creepy-crawlies that lie between you and your Mother!

In this game, you will navigate labyrinthine temples, finding relics that will prove critical to solving the ancient puzzles.

As with any ancient temple, there are traps aplenty, and you must keep your wits about if you wish to have any hope of finding your Mother!

Explore 9 main Dungeons, and 2 hub Dungeons connecting them all!




Developer Twitter: https://twitter.com/conspiracydawg
Company Twitter: https://twitter.com/crimsonrays_ent
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RalfsAdventure/
